title.rendered: Stacey Abrams Announces Statewide “One Georgia Tour”

content.rendered:
Abrams to meet Georgians across the state, discuss how as governor she will help every Georgian thrive

ATLANTA – One day after officially qualifying as a candidate for governor, Democratic candidate for governor Stacey Abrams announced a statewide “One Georgia Tour” in which she will meet Georgians across the state, talking about her plans to expand Medicaid and create jobs, fully fund education and address public safety and criminal justice reform.

Events next week will take place in the following cities: Albany, Athens, Atlanta, Augusta, Columbus, Cuthbert, Midway, Thomasville and Warner Robins.

Abrams went yesterday to the Georgia State Capitol, where she served for seven years as House Democratic Leader, to officially qualify as a candidate for governor. She was joined by her mother, father, sister and brother.

Abrams for Governor compiled a video of qualification day, which can be viewed here.
